value.name: Sparks man sent to prison for drug trafficking, illegal gun possession and fleeing police
value.description: A Sparks man will serve four to 11 years in prison for drug trafficking, being an ex-felon in possession of a gun and attempting to elude a peace officer. Adam Matthew Moore, 30, was arrested after selling drugs to an undercover narcotics officer in September 2019,

value.description: “That’s crazy, what is going on? I don’t know because I have four little kids,” she said. Matthew Moore, on the other hand, isn’t surprised at all. “People have guns in Florida, so, it’s a shooting, surprise surprise!” Moore said. If you ...

value.name: Suspects in two Charleston slayings indicted
value.description: Two suspects in two separate Charleston slayings were indicted by a grand jury in Kanawha County Circuit Court, which was announced Thursday.

value.name: Matthew Moore, Author
value.description: Matthew Moore works as an online news writer for HELLO! mainly covering celebrity news. Bitten by the writing bug early on in life, he went on to study Multimedia Journalism at the University of Northampton,

value.name: Sparks man gets 11-year prison term for several crimes
value.description: A Sparks man has been sentenced to 11 years in prison for a series of crimes over a year period that ended with his arrest last year after trying to flee from police for a second time.

value.name: Bobby Moore
value.description: Bobby Gene Moore, 82, of Scott City died Sunday, May 9, 2021, at Southeast Hospital in Cape Girardeau. He was born March 19, 1939, to Harold B. and Dula Mai Ray Moore Sr. He married Mary Bell Moore, daughter of the late Ned and June Moore,
